entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
